snippet: A cigarette on the sidewalk burned through caulking at the base of the Herald Square store and dropped into the subbasement, where it ignited debris, a Fire Department spokesman said.
abstract: A cigarette on the sidewalk burned through caulking at the base of the Herald Square store and dropped into the subbasement, where it ignited debris, a Fire Department spokesman said.

headline.main: Cigarette Started Macy's Fire, Investigators Find
